phrases: The life of the young boy that was sacrificed to my friend...
His soul has at long last been tainted.
Tainted by the fires of a remorse and hatred which will never fade.
You promised me that you would not go away anymore without telling me, did not you?
I could not bring myself to go to your funeral no matter how hard I tried.
Right up until yesterday, you were by my side.
You were always there for me when I needed you.
But now, all I have is this letter...
Why did it have to be you?
Why was it you instead of me?!
Act 19: Even if I Should Stop Being Me
Danglars Bank stocks have posted trading limit highs for several days now.
Every stock in his investment portfolio is on an explosive growth trend.
That Andrea kid did his job a lot better than I expected.
We will start flooding his investments with sell-offs.
The Paris market goes without saying, but the Eastern,
Keep flooding all of them with sell-offs in succession until each market closes.
Haidee wishes to speak with you.
Count, I love you more than I did my father.
I cannot bear to see you change any further.
Please, continuing to do this would be...
Unnecessary pawns are to be sacrificed without mercy!
Everything that stands between me and my revenge!
Did you only save me so that you could use me as a tool for revenge?
You are not that sort of man!
Count, I have faith in you!
The end is almost upon us...
Just take a look at today's stock prices, Andrea!
I cannot wipe the smile from my face!
I am glad to hear it.
I owe my success to you.
More importantly, about the wedding ceremony...
Something about a friend dying suddenly, so she cannot get married anytime soon.
Honestly, I have no idea where that girl gets her stubborn streak from.
If that is the case, it is quite understandable.
That reminds me, how is her mother doing?
She is been bedridden for quite some time.
Perhaps if I went and offered her my best...
If you were to keep her company, I am sure it would take her mind off things!
I certainly hope that you are right.
How much longer will our bank's assets continue to multiply like this?
Every last one of my stocks is humming along smoothly.
I am thinking of leaving Paris.
Come with me to my home town.
Admittedly, life there will not be as extravagant as we are used to here.
If it is just the two of us, I have enough saved away to at least keep us fed.
You are a real opportunist, are not you, Mother?
I have had all I can take!
When you get right down to it, it is you and your old friends' fault that this happened.
I got caught in the middle of you and your old lovers' sick love triangle.
Who gives a damn about Edmond Dantes?!
Why are my friends and l...
Why did Franz, of all people, have to die?!
It does not matter what happens to me.
Everybody would be better off if I had died.
If you want to blame me for what happened, go ahead and blame me for the rest of your life.
You should not think so little of yourself.
They always let me pass through.
You know, you really should not go around thinking you are still an aristocrat.
Your ID number's already been revoked.
You cannot come and go as you please anymore.
Like they say, a stupid father is going to have nothing but stupid kids.
That is assuming that they will even give you one.
Do not think that you can still boss us around!
This state is most unbecoming a beautiful lady such as yourself.
Seeing you sad simply tears my heart in two.
Men always say things like that to try to make me feel better.
I will always be by your side.
I am so glad you are all right...
Is this any time for you to be worrying about someone else?
What have you been up to?
She is been waiting for you for ages!
They are going at it in broad daylight!
Save that stuff for when you are in private, will ya?!
Ladies and gentlemen, allow me to introduce the man...
The man who saved Albert's life on Luna, the Count of Monte Cristo!
We cannot invite this man to Paris!
We both insisted that he come visit, remember?
Everybody says that they are dying to meet the Count.
He is a demon who is come back to Paris to get revenge on us all!
Darling, why do not you introduce yourself first?
I am feeling a little shy.
Get as far away from him as you can!
Thank you for your kind invitation.
He is the man who killed you!
You were the one who killed me.
Albert, when you think about it, it was you who killed me, right?
You only think of yourself, and you know it.
Every time I tried to tell you something, you never listened.
Franz, it was not like that!
I will hate you for as long as I live.
There is something that I have to tell you!
I guess there is nothing to worry about if you can still move like that.
By coincidence, I spotted a guy riding your bike.
Everybody needs a tool-loving, bike-loving friend, you know?
Admittedly, I pushed her so hard to get here that she is in pretty bad shape now.
Do you have any idea how badly I have been waiting for today to arrive?!
I looked everywhere for rare parts, endured setback after setback,
Chest swelled with anticipation, I set out in high spirits for a long drive, and what happens?
But who is that on it?!
So I pull up to him, planning to ask him what is going on, and...
My baby's showing signs of a recovery!
Are not you being overly dramatic?
There is no sadder sight than a machine that cannot be fixed!
I had the same problem that night we rescued Valentine.
You have no idea how bad my heart was broken that day.
How can you talk like that?
I volunteered my car because they said they were going to go rescue Valentine.
The thing is, I used to have a thing for Valentine...
You never said a word about it.
Do you remember when we came out here on a drive?
It was just a little while ago, but it feels like a distant memory.
That quiche that Valentine shared with us was great, was not it?
Sorry, I was just remembering that day.
You are always thinking about him.
I only have machines to soothe my troubled heart now!
C'mon, let us head back and grab something to eat.
We are being swamped with sell-offs!
I am trying as best I can to prop up the prices, but I am unable to keep up with the volume.
Sink all the money we have into it to stop the slide!
It is not just our bank stocks or those of our business group that are crashing.
Every stock that we have invested in is in a nosedive.
I am unable to determine the because.
If this keeps up, I will go bankrupt!
Infection by unknown virus detec... ted...
The Eastern market is open now.
Sell off everything but our bank stocks!
Today's weather in Paris is sunny... sunny.
Current temperature is 22 Celsi... sunny... with less than a 10 chance of precipita... sunny.
It is shaping up to be a pleasant day... sunny.
The Paris market closed today with prices considerably lower than yesterday's... sunny.
Michelle, start running these numbers immediately!
The prevailing opinion is that the market turned against overextended businesses...
I cannot keep up with it by myself!
The prevailing opinion is that the market turned against overextended businesses...
At the outbreak of this market run... sunny, sunny, sunny...
Why are you barging in like this?
I have something to tell you.
The thing is, your wedding with Andrea has been set for the day after tomorrow.
I told that you I cannot get married so soon after Franz died!
Are you saying that you do not care if l... no, this entire family...
How am I supposed to calm down?!
My stocks have taken a nosedive!
They are not worth the paper they are printed on now!
Give up on this worthless piano nonsense of yours!
You are the only one who can save this family.
You have got to marry Andrea right away!
All that matters to me is that I get my money back.
Thanks to this, Andrea's fortune will be mine!
Eugenie, at this moment, you are the most precious thing in the world to me.
Franz is still here with us.
That is the way I see it.
I get the feeling that he is showing us what path we have to take.
And where might you be going at this late hour?
Even the daughter of an aristocrat...
The day after tomorrow, you are going to belong to me.
The main course will have to wait until then...
Do not give up on your future.
No matter the time, no matter the place, you are never alone.
Next time on Gankutsuou, The Count of Monte Cristo, act 20...
Bide your time, and hold out hope!
